name: Cybermage
description:
Cybermage was created with the goal of making a metroidvania in 24 hours. All code and assets are original and were made during this time.

You play as a cybermage, exploring various sites, dodging obstacles and fighting enemies in order to connect each world to their home base.

Controls: Arrow keys to move, space to jump, up to interact with doors. Additional controls in game instructions.

Updates: For now all updates to the game will be purely bugfixes if there are softlocks or other major issues, as I want to keep the bulk of the work within the original 24 hours. Currently on version 0.0.3.
